Job Title: Residential Roofing Sales

Location: Lewis Center, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
JOB OPENING: ROOFING SALES REPRESENTATIVE (HIRING NOW)
Join Our Expanding Team at Ascent Roofing SolutionsAt Ascent Roofing Solutions, a dynamic and reputable roofing company based out of Lewis Center, OH, we are seeking a seasoned Roofing Sales Representative to contribute to our success in the Columbus area.With over 45 years of combined experience and a commitment to integrity and professional craftsmanship, Ascent is a beacon of reliability and expertise in both residential and commercial roofing sectors.
Our veteran-owned company is proud to have three veterans among our staff, bringing a wealth of knowledge and skill to each project we undertake.
What We Offer:Competitive Compensation: Base salary ranging from $45K to $75K, with potential earnings over $150K annually through commissions and routine performance-based bonuses.Commissions and Leads: Attractive commission structure, with opportunities to work on both company-generated leads and personal contacts.Focus on Residential Sales: Primary responsibility for residential projects, with occasional support on commercial projects as needed.Professional Development: Access to industry-specific training and opportunities for certifications during the offseason.Supportive Resources: Use of industry-leading tools for enhanced efficiency and effectiveness, ongoing training, and a company-branded vehicle for site visits. Personal vehicle required for commuting.
Qualifications:Proven Experience: At least 1 year in roofing sales or related field, focusing on residential properties preferred.Account Management: Strong ability to manage client relationships and maintain communication.Skills in Negotiation and Communication: Excellent abilities in both verbal and written form.Travel Requirements: Valid driver's license required, with readiness to visit client sites.Physical Requirements: Comfort with physical tasks such as roof inspections.
Responsibilities:Lead Management: Manage and convert both company-provided leads and leads from personal networking.Client Relationship Management: Build and sustain strong relationships with residential clients.Sales Targets: Achieve and exceed set sales targets through effective sales strategies and pipeline management.Market Analysis: Conduct detailed market research to stay ahead of industry trends and customer preferences.Product Demonstrations: Present roofing solutions tailored to meet the specific needs of residential clients.
Duties:Prospecting: Actively identify and engage potential residential clients from company leads and personal connections.Inspections: Perform thorough inspections of residential properties to assess roofing needs.Customer Engagement: Use expert knowledge and interpersonal skills to build trust and close sales.Contract Negotiation: Skillfully negotiate terms to ensure profitability and customer satisfaction.
Benefits:Opportunity to be part of a team with robust growth prospects.Pay structured to reward high performance with significant advancement potential.
Ready to Elevate Your Sales Career?Boasting an A+ BBB rating, glowing Google reviews, and numerous accolades, including 19 Angie’s List Super Service Awards, Ascent is not just raising the roof—we’re raising the standard. We seek individuals who share our values of dedication, loyalty, and hard work, who are committed to professionalism and customer satisfaction, and who are excited to be part of our legacy of quality and innovation in roofing solutions.
Join us during our growth phase for a unique opportunity to be part of a team of seasoned professionals. For more information on this position or to apply, please upload your resume below or email us at office@ascentroofingsolutions.com.

Experience Level (if available): None
